name: Shuckle
description: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

attacks.name: Berry Picking
attacks.effect: Shuffle up to 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

attacks.name: Bind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
